message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a larger share, but it needs to be fair.  This offer accounts for the future value.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
Time is running out, and we both lose if we can't agree. This is a fair offer, slightly favoring me due to the decreasing value.
Let's split the difference again, we're running out of time
This is my final offer. A perfectly even split is the only fair option.  Accept now, or we both get nothing.
